entries.name: Abyssal Hex
entries.effect: Afflicts target with murky visions and fear.

entries.name: Abyssal Pressure
entries.effect: Instantly damages all enemies in a radius.

entries.name: Abyssal Wrath
entries.effect: A brutal hammering with high-pressure force, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Acid Spit
entries.effect: A volatile burst of acid spit out at enemies, inflicting damage upon impact and leaving the Poisoned debuff.

entries.name: Aquatic Assault
entries.effect: Charge at the enemy underwater, gaining +1 damage upon successful hit dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Adamant Frame
entries.effect: Massive plating shrugs off punishing strikes, preventing puncturing hits like Aimed Shot.

entries.name: Aegis of Ra
entries.effect: Hallowed aura reduces incoming harm.

entries.name: Aerial Dodge
entries.effect: First ranged hit each round misses.

entries.name: Agonize
entries.effect: Blights the target with fel-empowered magic, dealing direct damage and leaving a Burning effect.

entries.name: Aimed Shot
entries.effect: Ignores all armor and line of sight barriers to deal heavy damage.

entries.name: Alchemical Tank Spray
entries.effect: Long hoses and portable tanks enable a heavy dousing of alchemical sludge and toxic fluids.

entries.name: All-Seeing
entries.effect: Fel sight pierces concealment briefly.

entries.name: Alloy Core
entries.effect: Composite shell resists wear and tear, reducing damage taken for a maximum of two turns.

entries.name: Alpha Command
entries.effect: Nearby beasts and primative humanoids gain morale and damage boost.

entries.name: Alpha’s Call
entries.effect: Nearby worgen gain morale advantage.

entries.name: Amber Sting
entries.effect: A scorpid sting that inflicts poison damage over several turns.

entries.name: Ambush
entries.effect: Deals extra damage when attacking from stealth or concealment.

entries.name: Amphibious Lunge
entries.effect: A strong rush forwards underwater, enabling fast reposiitioning.

entries.name: Ancestral Blessing
entries.effect: Bolsters allies with ancient power and a +1 advantage.

entries.name: Ancestral Courage
entries.effect: Immune to fear effects.

entries.name: Ancestral Fetters
entries.effect: Binds ancient spirits to the target, rooting them in place.

entries.name: Ancestral Recall
entries.effect: Calls on ancestral spirits for consultation or aid.

entries.name: Anchor Sigil
entries.effect: Calls upon the power of the sea to strengthen allied resolve.

entries.name: Anchor Smash
entries.effect: Brings down a rusted anchor with crushing force, Knocking Down enemies and dealing instant damage.

entries.name: Anima Infusion
entries.effect: Boosts damage dealt that persists for several rounds.

entries.name: Anima Surge
entries.effect: Discharges anima in a destabilizing burst that rapidly spreads.

entries.name: Animal Companion
entries.effect: Summons a beast to fight alongside them.

entries.name: Antiplague Draught
entries.effect: Briefly resists poison and disease.

entries.name: Antler Charge
entries.effect: Charge at the enemy, gaining +1 damage upon successful hit.

entries.name: Arcane Aegis
entries.effect: Wards dampen magical assaults for a short time, protecting allies from spell damage.

entries.name: Arcane Affinity
entries.effect: Increased resistance to magic.

entries.name: Arcane Barrage
entries.effect: Fires a massive bolt of arcane energy, blasting the enemy with heavy damage.

entries.name: Arcane Binding
entries.effect: Restrains or Roots target briefly.

entries.name: Arcane Bite
entries.effect: A bite that leaves a stinging arcane wound, Slowing the target.

entries.name: Arcane Blast
entries.effect: Releases a bolt of prismatic mana at range, dealing damage.

entries.name: Arcane Bolt
entries.effect: Strikes enemies with a more precise bolt raw arcane power with a +1 to hit chance.

entries.name: Arcane Defection
entries.effect: Turns enemy caster wards against their owners.

entries.name: Arcane Drain
entries.effect: Saps the mana from a target, Weakening them for a turn.

entries.name: Arcane Explosion
entries.effect: Releases a surge of arcane force at close range, dealing damage to all nearby targets. Doubles damage each time used in succession.

entries.name: Arcane Flood
entries.effect: Unleashes unstable energies, reducing hit chances for all nearby casters for a turn.

entries.name: Arcane Lance
entries.effect: Precision beam of arcane energy.

entries.name: Arcane Lash
entries.effect: Strikes with mana-hardened force, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Arcane Missiles
entries.effect: Unleashes a flurry of arcane bolts, striking the target three times with a successful hit.

entries.name: Arcane Pulse
entries.effect: A flashing pulse that clings to the target and damages nearby enemies for several turns.

entries.name: Arcane Purge
entries.effect: Dispels magical effects benefiting the target.

entries.name: Arcane Riposte
entries.effect: Counters magical strikes, preventing their impact.

entries.name: Arcane Shot
entries.effect: Arrow infused with pure energy, dealing both magic and physical damage that pierces magical barriers, or Slowing a target for several turns.

entries.name: Arcane Starvation
entries.effect: Cuts the target off from accessing mana-fueled abilities.

entries.name: Arcane Sting
entries.effect: Inflicts damage that persists for several rounds.

entries.name: Arcane Summon
entries.effect: Conjures an arcane construct to the field.

entries.name: Arcane Surge
entries.effect: Builds strength for two turns, then unleashes raw arcane power at an enemy, dealing double damage.

entries.name: Arcane Torrent
entries.effect: Breathes a cone of arcane wind that damages enemies before it.

entries.name: Arcane Torrent
entries.effect: Overwhelms foes with raw mana, Disoriented them for a turn.

entries.name: Arcane Ward
entries.effect: Reduces magical damage.

entries.name: Arcanist's Ritual
entries.effect: Conjures the most powerful magical constructs as an ally.

entries.name: Arcanist’s Focus
entries.effect: Sustains complex spells; reduces disruption from counter-magic.

entries.name: Archdruid's Ritual
entries.effect: Summons the most powerful nature elementals as elites, or bosses.

entries.name: Arena Champion
entries.effect: Strikes more fiercely when watched.

entries.name: Arena Strike
entries.effect: Can attack twice if first hit connects.

entries.name: Armor Plates
entries.effect: Grants a protective barrier or damage reduction.

entries.name: Armored Carapace
entries.effect: Grants a protective barrier or damage reduction.

entries.name: Armored Hide
entries.effect: Grants a protective barrier or damage reduction.

entries.name: Artifact Appraisal
entries.effect: Identifies relic properties; reduces risk from cursed finds.

entries.name: Ascendant’s Resilience
entries.effect: Reduces incoming damage while empowered.

entries.name: Ash Wake
entries.effect: Ignites the floor into a hazard that harms those who linger.

entries.name: Ashen Stamina
entries.effect: Less affected by environmental hazards in wastelands.

entries.name: Aura of Clarity
entries.effect: Improves ally focus.

entries.name: Aura of Purity
entries.effect: Instantly damages all enemies in a radius.

entries.name: Aureole
entries.effect: Radiates a halo burst, damaging nearby foes.

entries.name: Authority
entries.effect: Inspires loyalty and obedience, boosting morale for one turn.

entries.name: Avalanche Strike
entries.effect: Can Stagger multiple foes when fighting on slopes.

entries.name: Aviana’s Wrath
entries.effect: Foe suffers Weakened state if struck.

entries.name: Backstab
entries.effect: Deals double damage when flanking.

entries.name: Balanced Stance
entries.effect: Harder to knock down or stagger.

entries.name: Banana Toss
entries.effect: Distracts foe, giving allies advantage briefly.

entries.name: Banshee Form
entries.effect: Transforms into an ethereal banshee, capable of flight and possessing others.

entries.name: Banshee’s Veil
entries.effect: Fades into silence; harder to target.

entries.name: Barbed Javelin
entries.effect: Pierces and lodges, nagging the target and causing Bleeding wounds.

entries.name: Bark Orders
entries.effect: Nearby allies fight with discipline.

entries.name: Barkwhip
entries.effect: Whips with thorned vine, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Barnacled Hide
entries.effect: Crustacean-carapace skin dulls incoming harm.

entries.name: Barrage
entries.effect: Unleashes a flurry of shots at a group of enemies, dealing hit damage to all targets.

entries.name: Basalt Hide
entries.effect: Basalt plates or ember-shields dulls incoming harm.

entries.name: Battle Frenzy
entries.effect: Fighters harder and gains +1 to the next offensive roll when an enemy is injured.

entries.name: Battle-Hardened
entries.effect: Reduces incoming damage slightly.

entries.name: Battle Instinct
entries.effect: Anticipates enemy maneuvers, granting +1 to your next defensive action.

entries.name: Battle Paint
entries.effect: Ritual markings steel the will and shake enemy Morale.

entries.name: Battle Roar
entries.effect: Demoralizes enemies.

entries.name: Beacon Nova
entries.effect: Unleashes a radiant shockwave that weakens shadow foes.

entries.name: Bear Form
entries.effect: Transforms into a mighty bear, reducing damage taken.

entries.name: Bear Hug
entries.effect: Immobilizes foe briefly.

entries.name: Beast Bond
entries.effect: Beast companions can intervene and intercept an incoming damaging attack.

entries.name: Beast Tracker
entries.effect: Advantage on tracking rolls.

entries.name: Beastcall
entries.effect: Summons lesser beasts to overwhelm a target, knocking them down

entries.name: Bedrock Body
entries.effect: Stone plates interlock, reducing incoming harm.

entries.name: Bile Burst
entries.effect: Splashes corrosive rot that lingers.

entries.name: Bind Rift
entries.effect: Anchors a void tear to destabilize enemies and pull them towards the rift.

entries.name: Binding Decay
entries.effect: Inflicts with an eldritch rot that gnaws the target over several rounds.

entries.name: Binding Harpoon
entries.effect: Pins a foe, preventing escape briefly.

entries.name: Bite and Hold
entries.effect: Clamps down with fangs and force, dealing direct damage and forcing the target to break free or suffer further damage.

entries.name: Black Anvil
entries.effect: Freshly forged weapons strike harder, dealing extra damage on first use in combat.

entries.name: Black Arrow
entries.effect: Arrows tainted with dark magic that linger, draining the target's health.

entries.name: Blackrock Cannons
entries.effect: Spews rapid-fire barrages of cannon shot.

entries.name: Blade Flurry
entries.effect: Rapid strikes overwhelm a single target’s defenses.

entries.name: Blade Limbs
entries.effect: Bone-mounted weapons prevent disarming excepting literal disarming.

entries.name: Blasphemous Ward
entries.effect: Demonic warding canibalizes incoming harm to empower your next attack.

entries.name: Blast
entries.effect: Unleashes elemental or magical damage at range.

entries.name: Blazing Speed
entries.effect: Increases speed or action frequency through advantage to rolls.

entries.name: Blazing Strike
entries.effect: Smashes enemies with fiery weapons, dealing instant damage and leaving Burning damage.

entries.name: Bless
entries.effect: Ally gains improved rolls briefly.

entries.name: Blessed Servos
entries.effect: Enhances agility, ignoring first hinderance each round.

entries.name: Blessing of Elune
entries.effect: Empowers allies with holy lunar radiance.

entries.name: Blessing of Feathers
entries.effect: Nearby harpies resist damage briefly.

entries.name: Blessing of Light
entries.effect: Nearby allies take reduced damage this round.

entries.name: Blessing of Odyn
entries.effect: Grants nearby allies extra resilience, granting +1 to all rolls next round.

entries.name: Blight Breath
entries.effect: Spews a cloud of rot and bile that lingers upon armor and in lungs.

entries.name: Blight Vial
entries.effect: Shatters into a lingering pall of rot.

entries.name: Blink
entries.effect: Teleport a short distance.

entries.name: Blink Strike
entries.effect: Instantly relocates the user and grants a second action immediately.

entries.name: Block
entries.effect: Defensive skills blunt incoming harm.

entries.name: Blood Craze
entries.effect: Attacks strike harder at low HP.

entries.name: Blood Drain
entries.effect: Steals health from foes.

entries.name: Blood Frenzy
entries.effect: Inflicts Bleeding damage that persists for several rounds.

entries.name: Blood Hex
entries.effect: Afflicts target with lingering agony.

entries.name: Blood Oath
entries.effect: Fights harder when allies fall.

entries.name: Blood Pact
entries.effect: Sacrifices HP to empower allies.

entries.name: Blood Rites
entries.effect: Channels power from sacrifices.

entries.name: Blood Scent
entries.effect: Strengthens perceptions when tracking and hunting.

entries.name: Blood Siphon
entries.effect: Drinks life to mend its own wounds.

entries.name: Blood Trance
entries.effect: Focus intensifies when near death, increasing hit chance.

entries.name: Bloodhoof Tradition
entries.effect: Moral strength steadies allies nearby.

entries.name: Bloodied Panic
entries.effect: Results from unhealed Blood Frenzy wounds, making bleeds stronger the longer they persist.

entries.name: Bloodlust
entries.effect: Gains advantage to rolls after making a kill, affecting all allies.

entries.name: Bloodthirst
entries.effect: Heals slightly when killing enemies.

entries.name: Bloodthirsty Charge
entries.effect: Charge at the enemy, gaining +1 damage upon successful hit.

entries.name: Blooming Call
entries.effect: Summons a major nature elemental to the field.

entries.name: Boarding Leap
entries.effect: Jumps aboard enemy vessels easily.

entries.name: Boar’s Rally
entries.effect: Nearby Quilboar gain advantage this round.

entries.name: Boiler Patch
entries.effect: Briefly boosts an mechanical ally's output.

entries.name: Boiler Surge
entries.effect: Emergency steam burst to clear jams.

entries.name: Bomb Satchel
entries.effect: Throws an unstable explosive that blasts an area.

entries.name: Bombing Run
entries.effect: Drops a payload of explosives, dealing massive damage.

entries.name: Bonded Gryphon
entries.effect: Fights in perfect tandem with their mount, increasing hit chance.

entries.name: Bone Arrow
entries.effect: Splintering shafts that embed and ache, causing Bleeding.

entries.name: Bone Breaker
entries.effect: Cripples enemies with crushing blows, dealing heavy damage and stunning them for two turns.

entries.name: Bone Charm
entries.effect: Wards blunt some incoming blows.

entries.name: Bone Rot
entries.effect: A disease that rots the bone away, weakening the target and slowing them until cured.

entries.name: Bone Shards
entries.effect: Hurls jagged fragments that pierce will and flesh.

entries.name: Bone Shield
entries.effect: Inflicts damage to attacker upon being hit.

entries.name: Bone Spike
entries.effect: Ruptures bone spikes through the ground, impaling nearby enemies and rooting them in place.

entries.name: Bone Storm
entries.effect: Whips jagged ribs and vertebrae into a cutting gale.

entries.name: Bone Trident
entries.effect: A thrown trident of bone made by the Kvaldir that inflicts cursed wounds that linger.

entries.name: Bossy Presence
entries.effect: Nearby goblins deal +1 damage this round.

entries.name: Bossy Swagger
entries.effect: Enemies nearby lose morale when faced with the chieftain.

entries.name: Boulder Toss
entries.effect: Throws a hewn stone from range, dealing damage.

entries.name: Branded Sigil
entries.effect: A brand whose embers continue to burn the target over several rounds.

entries.name: Breath of Harmony
entries.effect: Heals or steadies allies briefly.

entries.name: Brine Mend
entries.effect: Heals wounds with seawater rituals.

entries.name: Bristlehide
entries.effect: Hide reduces incoming melee damage slightly.

entries.name: Broadside Cannons
entries.effect: Unleashes devastating synchronized volleys.

entries.name: Brood Authority
entries.effect: Nearby arachnid creatures go into a frenzy, increasing hit chance by 2.

entries.name: Brood Summon
entries.effect: Calls lesser spiderlings.

entries.name: Brutal Strike
entries.effect: Strikes an enemy with lethal, crushing force.

entries.name: Brutal Strike
entries.effect: Staggers foes with sheer force, crushing armor and leaving opponents Weakened.

entries.name: Bubble Prison
entries.effect: Encases foe in a bubble, immobilizing briefly.

entries.name: Bubble Ward
entries.effect: Shields an ally with absorb 2.

entries.name: Burning Presence
entries.effect: Enemies nearby suffer weakened morale.

entries.name: Burning Web
entries.effect: Roots enemies in place and inflicts burn damage that persists for several rounds.

entries.name: Burning Zeal
entries.effect: Strike with fanatical fervor, increasing damage dealt by 1. for three turns

entries.name: Burrow
entries.effect: Entity burrows underground, enabling them to Reemerge at any location.

entries.name: Buzzsaw Arms
entries.effect: Tearing melee attacks with sawblades, striking multiple targets.

entries.name: Cage of Ribs
entries.effect: Interlocking bones form a near-impervious shell.

entries.name: Call for Help
entries.effect: Summons nearby allies.

entries.name: Call of the Queen
entries.effect: Calls elite and greater spiderlings and instills fear, shaking Morale.

entries.name: Calm Aura
entries.effect: Nearby allies resist fear.

entries.name: Camouflage
entries.effect: Essential for effective stealth, conceal yourself with what's available nearby.

entries.name: Cannon Shot
entries.effect: Long ranged cannon shot that weakens fortifications.

entries.name: Cannonade
entries.effect: Coordinated broadside fire to devastate targets.

entries.name: Captain’s Rally
entries.effect: Nearby troops gain advantage on next roll.

entries.name: Carapace
entries.effect: Grants a protective barrier or damage reduction.

entries.name: Caravan Rally
entries.effect: Nearby Vulpera allies gain morale advantage.

entries.name: Cartel Rally
entries.effect: Nearby brokers gain morale advantage.

entries.name: Cataclysmic Bellow
entries.effect: Roars with tectonic power, causing all enemies to cower in fear.

entries.name: Caustic Strike
entries.effect: Slams into the foe, splashing corrosive filth that burns over time.

entries.name: Cave Maul
entries.effect: Delivers a crushing blow with a stalagmite club.

entries.name: Cemetery Plate
entries.effect: Grave-wrought armor blunts heavy blows.

entries.name: Chain Heal
entries.effect: Restores vitality to allies.

entries.name: Chain Lightning
entries.effect: Arcs to up to three nearby enemies, dealing reduced damage as it arcs.

entries.name: Charge
entries.effect: Charge at the enemy, gaining +1 damage upon successful hit.

entries.name: Charm Fetish
entries.effect: Carved idols increase damage dealt for two turns.

entries.name: Charm Idol
entries.effect: Wards off minor spell damage.

entries.name: Charm Lash
entries.effect: A whip crack of fel energy dealt from mid-range, dealing damage.

entries.name: Chi Strike
entries.effect: Precise blow that disrupts balance and interrupts spellcasting.

entries.name: Chieftain’s Authority
entries.effect: Allies resist fear and panic effects.

entries.name: Chill of the Grave
entries.effect: Cold touch that saps warmth and slows the body.

entries.name: Chitin Bulwark
entries.effect: Layered plates resist crushing force.

entries.name: Chronal Curiosity
entries.effect: Draconic senses pierce concealment briefly.

entries.name: Chrono Breath
entries.effect: Breathes a cone of sand-laden time that damages enemies before it.

entries.name: Cinder Breath
entries.effect: Breathes a cone of flame or cinders that damages enemies before it.

entries.name: Cinder Core
entries.effect: All attacks that land on enemies deal fire damage.

entries.name: Circling Fear
entries.effect: Forces the target to flee or lose control.

entries.name: Clan Authority
entries.effect: Nearby orcs rally in strength.

entries.name: Clan Pride
entries.effect: Like kin fight harder when together, granting +1 advantage.

entries.name: Clan Rally
entries.effect: Nearby tuskarr fight harder this round.

entries.name: Claw Swipe
entries.effect: Heavy swipe causes intense bleeding.

entries.name: Cleanse
entries.effect: Removes corruption from allies.

entries.name: Clearing the Lane
entries.effect: Shatters fortifications with a shaped blast, injuring anyone standing along the path.

entries.name: Cleave of Sewn Flesh
entries.effect: A sweeping butcher’s swing that cuts multiple foes and leaves bleeding wounds.

entries.name: Cloak Field
entries.effect: Activates stealth using a cloaking device.

entries.name: Club Bash
entries.effect: Heavy strike with a crude club.

entries.name: Club Sweep
entries.effect: Swings a mighty club at enemies, damaging nearby targets.

entries.name: Cluster Charge
entries.effect: Launches a bundle that scatters sub-charges.

entries.name: Cocoon
entries.effect: Encases prey for later feeding.

entries.name: Codex of Secrets
entries.effect: Reveal hidden knowledge, nullifying illusions.

entries.name: Cold Hardened
entries.effect: Takes less frost damage.

entries.name: Coldfire Veins
entries.effect: Blue witchlight flickers within, dampening damage taken.

entries.name: Collateral Damage
entries.effect: On defeat, may detonate remaining charges.

entries.name: Command of the Deep
entries.effect: Nearby gilgoblins and Kvaldir fight with renewed fury.

entries.name: Command of the Skies
entries.effect: Allied winged Arakkoa resist morale loss.

entries.name: Command Terracotta
entries.effect: Orders a statue to intercept a blow.

entries.name: Command the Shoal
entries.effect: Nearby naga fight more fiercely under their orders.

entries.name: Commander’s Rally
entries.effect: Nearby Ankoan fight harder this round.

entries.name: Commanding Presence
entries.effect: Enemies lose morale in their presence.

entries.name: Commanding Roar
entries.effect: Nearby allies fight harder this round.

entries.name: Community Bond
entries.effect: Nearby allies gain morale when protecting villagers.

entries.name: Condemn
entries.effect: Weakens a foe with holy judgment.

entries.name: Control Construct
entries.effect: Commands arcane guardians.

entries.name: Controlling Hex
entries.effect: Takes control of a target through the use of magic.

entries.name: Cool Touch
entries.effect: Restores health to a target.

entries.name: Coordinated Fire
entries.effect: Coordinated volleys stagger enemy lines, adding +1 damage done for all allies who join the effort firing at the target.

entries.name: Corded Muscle
entries.effect: Dense sinew softens heavy impacts.

entries.name: Corpse Lob
entries.effect: Hurls rotting payloads that spread terror and disease.

entries.name: Corrupted Bloodline
entries.effect: Resistant to necrotic effects and dark magic damage.

entries.name: Corrupted Strength
entries.effect: Takes less damage while under half HP.

entries.name: Corrupted Totem
entries.effect: Summons twisted elemental power, cursing targets upon successful hits.

entries.name: Corrupting Touch
entries.effect: A sapping malison reduces the target’s potency.

entries.name: Corruption Aura
entries.effect: Instantly damages all enemies in a radius.

entries.name: Corruption Strike
entries.effect: Fel-tainted blow weakens foe.

entries.name: Council Leverage
entries.effect: Sways neutral factions with political pressure.

entries.name: Counterspell
entries.effect: Interrupts enemy casting.

entries.name: Court Connections
entries.effect: Opens doors in human and elven courts alike.

entries.name: Crane Kick
entries.effect: Precise blow that Staggers enemies.

entries.name: Crimson Fetish
entries.effect: Blood-soaked charms dull incoming harm.

entries.name: Crude Rifle
entries.effect: Fires inaccurate but powerful shots.

entries.name: Crude Smash
entries.effect: Heavy melee strike with improvised weapon.

entries.name: Crude Weapons
entries.effect: Rusty spears and tridents cause minor wounds.

entries.name: Cruel Strike
entries.effect: A lust for pain imparts more focused damage upon hits.

entries.name: Crushing Blow
entries.effect: Slams enemy with overwhelming force, staggering target briefly.

entries.name: Crushing Charge
entries.effect: Charge at the enemy, gaining +1 damage upon successful hit.

entries.name: Crushing Fist
entries.effect: Slams enemy with overwhelming force, staggering target briefly.

entries.name: Crushing Grip
entries.effect: Grasps with primal force, dealing direct damage and trapping the target.

entries.name: Crushing Infernal
entries.effect: Summons an infernal at the location, dealing crushing damage to anyone beneath it.

entries.name: Crystal Shard
entries.effect: Launches empowered crystal fragments.

entries.name: Curse of Sand
entries.effect: Slows and disorients target.

entries.name: Cursed Claw
entries.effect: Strike has a chance to inflict Bleeding.

entries.name: Cut and Run
entries.effect: Moves quickly after an attack.

entries.name: Dark Harvest
entries.effect: Heals slightly on dealing damage.

entries.name: Dark Vision
entries.effect: Peers into likely outcomes, reducing chance of ambush.

entries.name: Dash
entries.effect: Quickly move a short distance without teleporting.

entries.name: Deadly Venom
entries.effect: Inflicts sickness that weakens and harms.

entries.name: Death Coil
entries.effect: A bolt of magic that siphons harms the living or steadies the dead.

entries.name: Death Hex
entries.effect: Weakens target’s morale and next roll.

entries.name: Death March
entries.effect: Rallies skeleton ranks to press forward.

entries.name: Death Mark
entries.effect: For two turns before the assassin appears, suffer -2 to your rolls.

entries.name: Death Pact
entries.effect: Binds a soul, stealing its vitality.

entries.name: Death Rune
entries.effect: Carves necrotic runes that weaken foes.

entries.name: Deathly Strike
entries.effect: Melee attack carries necrotic energy.

entries.name: Deathward Marrow
entries.effect: Old bone and deep runes resist even brutal blows.

entries.name: Deep Roots
entries.effect: Vines seize the target, preventing movement.

entries.name: Deep Stride
entries.effect: Moves swiftly through aquatic terrain.

entries.name: Defensive Aegis
entries.effect: Lightforged runes reinforce hull plating against magic.

entries.name: Defensive Stance
entries.effect: Takes reduced melee damage briefly.

entries.name: Defiant Guard
entries.effect: Counters forced movement or disarm effects.

entries.name: Demonic Endurance
entries.effect: Bolstered by fel energy, reducing damage taken.

entries.name: Demonologist's Ritual
entries.effect: Summons the most powerful entities as undead elites, or bosses.

entries.name: Desert Blessing
entries.effect: Shields an ally with spiritual power and heals them when damaged.

entries.name: Devour Soul
entries.effect: Steals health from one target, consuming it for the user.

entries.name: Diagnostic Ping
entries.effect: Highlights weak points for allied fire.

entries.name: Dino Bond
entries.effect: Enrages a dinosaur ally.

entries.name: Diplomatic Prowess
entries.effect: Reduces backlash from volatile negotiations and court intrigue.

entries.name: Diplomatic Shield
entries.effect: Reduces fallout from faction incidents in cities.

entries.name: Dirty Fighting
entries.effect: Distracts with sand or dirt toss.

entries.name: Disarm
entries.effect: Disarm an enemy.

entries.name: Discipline of Balance
entries.effect: Reduces panic or frenzy in allies nearby.

entries.name: Diseased Bite
entries.effect: Clamps down with fangs and force, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Disenchant
entries.effect: Weakens magical protections.

entries.name: Disguise
entries.effect: Blends seamlessly among enemies.

entries.name: Disintegrating Gaze
entries.effect: Fires a piercing beam that damages enemies in a straight line.

entries.name: Disrupt
entries.effect: Interrupts a spell or channeled ability.

entries.name: Distant Sight
entries.effect: Grants visions and sight across long distance.

entries.name: Dive
entries.effect: Rakes with talons in a diving pass, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Dive Attack
entries.effect: Inflicts damage that persists for several rounds.

entries.name: Doctrine of the Blade
entries.effect: Nearby Blood Knights gain focused resolve.

entries.name: Doom Curse
entries.effect: A doom-mark lingers, afflicting the target with harm until they explode.

entries.name: Drag to the Deep
entries.effect: Yanks a target toward the user.

entries.name: Dragon Tamer
entries.effect: Commands enslaved drakes.

entries.name: Dual Smash
entries.effect: Both clubs sweep wide, damaging nearby foes.

entries.name: Echolocation
entries.effect: Reveals hidden or invisible units briefly.

entries.name: Eldritch Knockback
entries.effect: A violent spasm of force sends the target backward.

entries.name: Elemental Blast
entries.effect: Unleashes a blast of raw elemental energy.

entries.name: Elemental Bolt
entries.effect: Unleashes a bolt of raw elemental energy.

entries.name: Elemental Grasp
entries.effect: Vines seize multiple targets in place, preventing movement.

entries.name: Elemental Surge
entries.effect: Unleashes a strong blast of raw elemental energy.

entries.name: Enchanted Ward
entries.effect: A planted ward softens incoming harm briefly.

entries.name: Entangling Roots
entries.effect: Roots foes in place briefly.

entries.name: Enthrall
entries.effect: Enthralls a target, taking full control over them.

entries.name: Entropic Malignance
entries.effect: While afflicted, all damage dealt is reduced by half.

entries.name: Entropy Surge
entries.effect: Unleashes a focused fel-arcane blast at range, dealing damage.

entries.name: Entropy Wave
entries.effect: Projects an umbral surge at range, dealing damage.

entries.name: Erratic Gizmos
entries.effect: Devices malfunction and jam up, stunning the entity.

entries.name: Escape Portal
entries.effect: Phase out of danger once per encounter.

entries.name: Ethereal Flight
entries.effect: Instantly relocates the user.

entries.name: Eversong Pathfinder
entries.effect: Ignores terrain penalties in woodland and ruin.

entries.name: Exarch’s Command
entries.effect: Nearby draenei gain attack and defense bonuses.

entries.name: Explosive Charge
entries.effect: Throws unstable bombs.

entries.name: Explosive Payload
entries.effect: Drops volatile bombs or barrels on enemies below.

entries.name: Explosive Round
entries.effect: Occasionally loads unstable ammo for added punch.

entries.name: Explosive Satchel
entries.effect: Throws a bomb that deals area damage.

entries.name: Explosive Vial
entries.effect: Deals AoE damage once per encounter.

entries.name: Eye Beam
entries.effect: Fires a piercing beam that damages enemies in a straight line.

entries.name: Eye of the Gale
entries.effect: Bursts a gale that damages nearby foes.

entries.name: Faithful Resilience
entries.effect: Resists fear briefly.

entries.name: Falcon Watch Garrison
entries.effect: Enlists local aid; reduces travel time in the region.

entries.name: Falconry Bond
entries.effect: Increases damage, critical chance, or potency.

entries.name: Fan of Knives
entries.effect: Unleashes blades in a deadly arc.

entries.name: Fanged Maul
entries.effect: Strikes with primal force, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Farstrider’s Poise
entries.effect: Calm precision; resists forced movement and distractions.

entries.name: Fear Aura
entries.effect: A wave of dread forces the weak-willed to flee.

entries.name: Fearless
entries.effect: Resists intimidation.

entries.name: Fel Arrow
entries.effect: Arrows burn with fel energy.

entries.name: Fel Barrage
entries.effect: Fires multiple projectiles into an area.

entries.name: Fel Barrier
entries.effect: Shields with demonic energy.

entries.name: Fel Bite
entries.effect: Inflicts a fel-tainted wound that persists unless cleansed.

entries.name: Fel Bolt
entries.effect: Fires a crackling bolt of fel at range, dealing damage.

entries.name: Fel Claw
entries.effect: Inflicts damage that bleeds for several rounds.

entries.name: Fel Cleave
entries.effect: Cleaves nearby targets in a wide arc, causing bleeds that persist.

entries.name: Fel Command
entries.effect: Nearby demons, man’ari, and demonic allies gain bonuses.

entries.name: Fel Invocation
entries.effect: Weakens a target’s morale.

entries.name: Fel Rend
entries.effect: Tears through magical wards.

entries.name: Fel Rupture
entries.effect: Fel spikes rupture through the earth, impaling enemies and dealing heavy damage.

entries.name: Fel Shock
entries.effect: Deals fel damage and staggers the target.

entries.name: Fel Slash
entries.effect: Strikes wreathed in fel energy.

entries.name: Felblade Strike
entries.effect: Strikes wreathed in fel fire.

entries.name: Felbrand
entries.effect: Siphons life with lingering fel rot over several rounds.

entries.name: Feral Rage
entries.effect: Increases damage drastically when allies fall.

entries.name: Ferocious Bite
entries.effect: Inflicts damage that bleeds for several rounds.

entries.name: Fetid Hex
entries.effect: Weakens enemy’s next action.

entries.name: Field Cartography
entries.effect: Generates maps that grant movement advantage.

entries.name: Field Repair
entries.effect: Can patch nearby mechanicals for minor HP.

entries.name: Fiery Potion Toss
entries.effect: Throws a fiery potion, dealing damage and spreading fire.

entries.name: Fire Blast
entries.effect: Instantly burns enemy target heavily.

entries.name: Fire Blossom
entries.effect: Explodes in a burst of flame petals.

entries.name: Firestorm
entries.effect: Unleashes waves of flame.

entries.name: Flame Breath
entries.effect: Inflicts damage across a wide area.

entries.name: Flame Crash
entries.effect: Ignites the ground into a hazard that harms those who linger.

entries.name: Flame Lash
entries.effect: Sears the target with a burning strike, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Flame Shock
entries.effect: Burns enemy over time.

entries.name: Flame Surge
entries.effect: Ignites terrain briefly.

entries.name: Flee
entries.effect: At low health, may attempt to run instead of fight.

entries.name: Fleet Hooves
entries.effect: May disengage after striking.

entries.name: Fleshcraft
entries.effect: Warps a target’s body with agonizing change.

entries.name: Flight of Feathers
entries.effect: Nearby allies ignore terrain penalties.

entries.name: Flow
entries.effect: Increases speed or action frequency through advantage to rolls.

entries.name: Flowing Momentum
entries.effect: Strikes again if first blow hits.

entries.name: Flurry Strike
entries.effect: Rapid blow sequence disrupts guard.

entries.name: Focused Cast
entries.effect: A narrowly focused spellcast with a much higher chance of striking the target.

entries.name: Foresight
entries.effect: Bears witness to visions of the future.

entries.name: Forked Lightning
entries.effect: Electrifies multiple foes with a storm bolt.

entries.name: Frenzied Attack
entries.effect: Strikes erratically, harder at low health.

entries.name: Frost Nova
entries.effect: Freezes foes briefly.

entries.name: Fumes
entries.effect: Enemies adjacent at round start take minor poison damage.

entries.name: Garrote
entries.effect: Deals precise instant damage and silences target briefly.

entries.name: Gateway Conjuration
entries.effect: Opens tactical portals for rapid redeployments or retreats.

entries.name: Gnaw
entries.effect: Inflicts damage that persists for several rounds.

entries.name: Goldrinn’s Rage
entries.effect: Deal a second attack each turn until a failure.

entries.name: Gore Hook
entries.effect: Snags and drags prey into crushing reach.

entries.name: Gore-Plated Bulk
entries.effect: Grotesque mass shrugs off lesser blows.

entries.name: Grave Discipline
entries.effect: Holds formation under withering fire.

entries.name: Grave Duty
entries.effect: Against undead foes, gains brief resolve after each fail or injury.

entries.name: Grave Tempest
entries.effect: A roar that spills hoarfrost and bone splinters across the field.

entries.name: Grease the Wheels
entries.effect: Crew improvises quick repairs mid-battle.

entries.name: Greedy Command
entries.effect: Nearby allies fight harder if promised reward.

entries.name: Guardian’s Ward
entries.effect: Nearby allies resist knockback briefly.

entries.name: Guidance
entries.effect: Corrects course toward marked targets.

entries.name: Gust
entries.effect: Injuries enemies and pushes them back.

entries.name: Gyro Legs
entries.effect: Clambers over rough ground with ease.

entries.name: Hammer of the Naaru
entries.effect: Strikes with radiant force.

entries.name: Hamstring
entries.effect: Cuts tendons and hamstrings and slows mobility.

entries.name: Healing Current
entries.effect: Jumps between targets, dealing reduced healing to allies.

entries.name: Healing Potion Toss
entries.effect: Throws a healing potion, restoring health to those in the area.

entries.name: Healing Touch
entries.effect: Restores minor wounds.

entries.name: Healing Wave
entries.effect: Restores lots of health to an ally.

entries.name: Hellfire Breath
entries.effect: Damages enemies in a frontal cone.

entries.name: Hex
entries.effect: Transforms enemies into helpless forms.

entries.name: Hex of Drought
entries.effect: Afflicts enemy with withering weakness.

entries.name: Hex of Misfortune
entries.effect: Inflicts bad luck on target.

entries.name: Hex of Weakness
entries.effect: A doom-mark lingers, afflicting the target with weakness.

entries.name: Hit-and-Run
entries.effect: May disengage after striking.

entries.name: Hive Dash
entries.effect: Skitters in a rapid dash.

entries.name: Hold the Line
entries.effect: Nearby allies resist being pushed back.

entries.name: Holy Nova
entries.effect: Releases a surge of holy force at close range, dealing damage to all nearby targets and healing allies in range. Doubles damage each time used in succession.

entries.name: Hoof Stomp
entries.effect: Briefly staggers a foe.

entries.name: Horn Charge
entries.effect: Charge at the enemy, gaining +1 damage upon successful hit.

entries.name: Hydraulic Stride
entries.effect: Leg servos keep pace over obstacles.

entries.name: Hyena Pack
entries.effect: Summons or commands desert hyenas for support.

entries.name: Illusion Break
entries.effect: Dispels glamours and disguises.

entries.name: immolation_aura
entries.effect: Burns attackers on contact.

entries.name: Imprison
entries.effect: Captures foes with magical restraint.

entries.name: Interdict
entries.effect: Interrupts teleportation and planar travel in a radius.

entries.name: Jade Bolt
entries.effect: A cutting arcane shard of jade-tinted force.

entries.name: Keen Senses
entries.effect: Reveals hidden or invisible units briefly.

entries.name: Keg Smash
entries.effect: Smashes a keg to deal damage, and spreads slippery ale on the floor causing slowness.

entries.name: Lance Charge
entries.effect: Charge at the enemy, gaining +1 damage upon successful hit and knocking enemies down.

entries.name: Lava Gout
entries.effect: Ember-heat or stone shards harm the target over time.

entries.name: Lava Smash
entries.effect: Strikes with primal force, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Lava Strike
entries.effect: Searing blow crashes into the target, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Leap
entries.effect: Quickly move a short distance without teleporting.

entries.name: Leap Strike
entries.effect: Quickly move a short distance without teleporting and immediately deal damage.

entries.name: Leyline Attunement
entries.effect: Allied casters near ley nodes act with added clarity and speed.

entries.name: Life Breath
entries.effect: Breath of life that raises or steadies an ally.

entries.name: Life Drain
entries.effect: Steals vitality from foes.

entries.name: Life Tap
entries.effect: Converts one's own health into additional damage points.

entries.name: Lightning Burst
entries.effect: Deals heavy single-target strike.

entries.name: Lightning Call
entries.effect: Deals a strong blast of lightning to the target.

entries.name: Lunar Blessing
entries.effect: Lunar blessings protect against incoming damage for one turn.

entries.name: Magical Affinity
entries.effect: Increases magical damage dealt for several rounds.

entries.name: Magister's Portalworks
entries.effect: Establishes arcane links for rapid redeployments.

entries.name: Magma Crash
entries.effect: Ember-heat or stone shards harm the target over time.

entries.name: Magnet Claw
entries.effect: Snatches metal debris from the ground.

entries.name: Mana Barrier
entries.effect: Protects themselves with energy shield.

entries.name: Mana Bolt
entries.effect: Fires a bolt of arcane energy from range, dealing damage.

entries.name: Mana Burn
entries.effect: Target suffers -1 to next magical action.

entries.name: Mana Potion Toss
entries.effect: Throws a mana potion, boosting haste for spellcasting.

entries.name: Mana Sense
entries.effect: Draconic senses pierce concealment briefly.

entries.name: Massive Stomp
entries.effect: Instantly damages all enemies in a radius.

entries.name: Matriarch’s Call
entries.effect: Nearby harpies gain morale advantage.

entries.name: Meat Hook
entries.effect: Drags a victim off balance into crushing reach.

entries.name: Mechanical Drone
entries.effect: Deploys a drone to scout or harass.

entries.name: Mechano-Bomb
entries.effect: Deploys unstable gadgets for chaotic effects.

entries.name: Meditation
entries.effect: Recovers and steadies spirit.

entries.name: Mindless Drive
entries.effect: Fights on despite pain or fear.

entries.name: Mist Form
entries.effect: Transform into mist to avoid damage.

entries.name: Molten Hide
entries.effect: Blazing hide sears weapons, dulling harm.

entries.name: Moonbeam
entries.effect: Calls down a shaft of moonlight that burns the target over several turns.

entries.name: Moonfire
entries.effect: Smite enemies with lunar energy.

entries.name: Moonlit Arrow
entries.effect: Harms enemies over several turns and prevents them from concealing themselves.

entries.name: Mud Hex
entries.effect: Slows a foe briefly.

entries.name: Murky Hex
entries.effect: Weakens the enemy’s attacks.

entries.name: Nature Surge
entries.effect: Vines seize the target, preventing movement.

entries.name: Necromancer's Ritual
entries.effect: Reanimates the most powerful entities as undead elites, or bosses.

entries.name: Necrotic Channel
entries.effect: Saps morale and health from nearby foes.

entries.name: Necrotic Command
entries.effect: Nearby Drust fight harder under their aura.

entries.name: Negotiator
entries.effect: Attempts to sway hostiles briefly.

entries.name: Net Cast
entries.effect: Throws a net to immobilize prey briefly.

entries.name: Night Vision
entries.effect: Reveals hidden or invisible units briefly.

entries.name: Nocturnal Predator
entries.effect: Strikes with enhanced primal force at night, doubling damage dealt.

entries.name: Northern Might
entries.effect: Innate resilience to fatigue and cold.

entries.name: Obelisk Ward
entries.effect: Raises a runic ward that dulls volleys.

entries.name: Obsidian Plates
entries.effect: Basalt plates or ember-shields blunt incoming harm.

entries.name: Ocean’s Wrath
entries.effect: Unleashes a wave of force that knocks foes back.

entries.name: Oil Flask
entries.effect: Creates burning terrain on impact.

entries.name: Orderly Command
entries.effect: Nearby guards act with greater discipline.

entries.name: Overload
entries.effect: Forces constructs to explode on defeat.

entries.name: Overloaded Cargo
entries.effect: Explodes violently when sunk, scattering debris.

entries.name: Overworked
entries.effect: Suffers penalties if pushed too hard.

entries.name: Pack Warfare
entries.effect: Enemies suffer morale loss when outnumbered by humanoid creatures.

entries.name: Patch Kit
entries.effect: Repairs constructs and armor plates.

entries.name: Piercing Talons
entries.effect: Rakes with talons in a diving pass, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Piercing Thrust
entries.effect: A carefully aimed thrust that punctures light armor.

entries.name: Pincer Clamp
entries.effect: Snaps heavy pincers, dealing direct damage and latching on until knocked loose.

entries.name: Pinning Throw
entries.effect: A thrown weapon that pins or staggers a target briefly.

entries.name: Poisoned Arrow
entries.effect: Inflicts poison condition on a target.

entries.name: Possession
entries.effect: Briefly overwhelms a weakened will.

entries.name: Pounce
entries.effect: Leap at an enemy, toppling them and dealing instant damage.

entries.name: Prayer
entries.effect: Heals a small amount.

entries.name: Pressure Jet
entries.effect: Blasts steam to shove attackers off balance.

entries.name: Prism Beam
entries.effect: Fires a cutting ray through enemies in a line.

entries.name: Prismatic Breath
entries.effect: Breathes a cone of mixed-flight power that damages enemies before it.

entries.name: Prophetic Insight
entries.effect: Once per scene, forewarns allies of a threat.

entries.name: Prophetic Vision
entries.effect: Allies gain practical advantages upon success.

entries.name: Protective Oath
entries.effect: Takes reduced damage while guarding merchants.

entries.name: Prowl
entries.effect: Conceals or reduces chance to be targeted.

entries.name: Quake Stomp
entries.effect: Shakes the ground to stagger enemies.

entries.name: Quick Escape
entries.effect: May disengage after striking.

entries.name: Quick Sprout
entries.effect: Quickly sprouts up seddlings which heal allies over time.

entries.name: Quill Burst
entries.effect: Unleashes barbed quills at enemies in front.

entries.name: Rabid Fever
entries.effect: A disease that evolves into feral behavior if not cured.

entries.name: Radiant Soar
entries.effect: Sweep up into the skies and relocate without teleporting.

entries.name: Radiant Strike
entries.effect: A ranged or melee strike imbued with searing Light that weakens shadow foes, demons, and undead.

entries.name: Raise Greater Undead
entries.effect: Reanimates major entities as undead pawns.

entries.name: Raise Lesser Undead
entries.effect: Reanimates minor entities as undead minions.

entries.name: Rallying Cry
entries.effect: Nearby elves gain advantage on next roll.

entries.name: Rallying Roar
entries.effect: Nearby orcs gain advantage on next roll.

entries.name: Rallying Shout
entries.effect: Nearby allies gain advantage on next roll.

entries.name: Rapid Fire
entries.effect: Unleashes quick volleys of arrows.

entries.name: Raptor Form
entries.effect: Transform into the shape of a raptor.

entries.name: Rattle Dive
entries.effect: A plunging strike that shatters guard and resolve.

entries.name: Reemerge
entries.effect: Burrowed targets reemerge, knocking enemies off-balance or knocking them down.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.effect: Natural regeneration that passively restores 1 health each turn, except when below half health.

entries.name: Regrowth
entries.effect: Heals an ally for 6 health points, but takes two turns to cast.

entries.name: Rejuvenation
entries.effect: Heals an ally for 1 health point each turn, for three turns.

entries.name: Relic Catalog
entries.effect: Quickly classifies finds; allies gain targeted advantages vs. artifact effects.

entries.name: Repair Bot
entries.effect: Deploys a device to restore constructs or armor.

entries.name: Rift Explosion
entries.effect: Collapses a Void Rift to unleash an explosion that injures and weakens enemies.

entries.name: Rift Implosion
entries.effect: Collapses a Void Rift to create a gravity well, sucking all enemies towards it.

entries.name: Rift Step
entries.effect: Short blink through the Veil to reposition.

entries.name: Righteous Zeal
entries.effect: Strikes harder when facing heretical enemies.

entries.name: Rocket Pack
entries.effect: Can leap or dash with unpredictable results.

entries.name: Rot Aura
entries.effect: Damages all enemies in a radius every turn while active, and heavier damage to weakened or cursed targets.

entries.name: Sabotage
entries.effect: Can disable traps or wards.

entries.name: Sand Scatter
entries.effect: Blinds enemies briefly.

entries.name: Savage Bite
entries.effect: Inflicts a disease that persists until cured.

entries.name: Savage Lunge
entries.effect: Ferocious leap that rattles a defender’s guard.

entries.name: Savage Rush
entries.effect: Charge at the enemy, gaining +1 damage upon successful hit.

entries.name: Scavenger
entries.effect: Can jury-rig weapons for weak strikes.

entries.name: Scourge Scent
entries.effect: Tracks the living through stench of fear and blood.

entries.name: Seal of Blood
entries.effect: Powerful magic reflects all damage back at the attacker for a time.

entries.name: Self-Weld
entries.effect: Fuses loose plates to patch damage.

entries.name: Serpent Form
entries.effect: Transform into the shape of a serpent.

entries.name: Shadow Bind
entries.effect: Immobilizes a foe in deathly grasp.

entries.name: Shadow Bolt
entries.effect: Blasts enemies with shadow magic.

entries.name: Shadow Breath
entries.effect: Blasts enemies ahead of the caster with a sickening wave of shadow magic.

entries.name: Shadow Leap
entries.effect: Can move between shadows once per round.

entries.name: Shadowmeld
entries.effect: Conceals or reduces chance to be targeted.

entries.name: Shadowstep
entries.effect: Instantly repositions the user behind

entries.name: Shell Shield
entries.effect: Grants a protective barrier or damage reduction.

entries.name: Shell Whistle
entries.effect: Alerts and calls more murlocs.

entries.name: Shield Bash
entries.effect: Bashes enemy, inflicting Off-Balance and interrupting their spells.

entries.name: Shield Block
entries.effect: First hit each round is reduced.

entries.name: Shield Discipline
entries.effect: Take +1 advantage to all rolls while actively defending allies against damage.

entries.name: Shield of Sethraliss
entries.effect: Resists first hit each round by 1.

entries.name: Shield of the Court
entries.effect: Projects a brief barrier for nearby allies in formation.

entries.name: Shield Wall
entries.effect: Interlocks shields to soften incoming harm.

entries.name: Shield Warders
entries.effect: Elven magi protect the ship from incoming fire, deflecting attacks.

entries.name: Shimmering Barrier
entries.effect: An arcane barrier shimmers, reducing incoming harm.

entries.name: Shockwave
entries.effect: Unleashes a staggering shockwave that knocks all enemies down and deals damage.

entries.name: Shoot
entries.effect: A standard shot that deals ranged damage.

entries.name: Shriek
entries.effect: Forces the target to flee or lose control.

entries.name: Silencing Arrow
entries.effect: Briefly disrupts spellcasting and calls for aid.

entries.name: Silken Escape
entries.effect: Drops down webs to obscure retreat.

entries.name: Silver Covenant Rally
entries.effect: Nearby Quel’dorei rally against overwhelming odds, gaining morale and a +1 advantage to all rolls.

entries.name: Skittering Rush
entries.effect: A rapid advance with chitinous blades, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Skystrike
entries.effect: Dives with a spear from above.

entries.name: Sleep Spores
entries.effect: Dream-haze weighs on the target, reducing movement speed.

entries.name: Slow
entries.effect: Reduces movement speed.

entries.name: Smite
entries.effect: Deals radiant holy damage.

entries.name: Smoke Bomb
entries.effect: Creates concealment for escape or ambush.

entries.name: Snare Trap
entries.effect: Immobilizes a target briefly.

entries.name: Solar Lance
entries.effect: Fires a concentrated beam of arcane and holy magic.

entries.name: Song of Ensnare
entries.effect: Entrances and roots an enemy briefly.

entries.name: Soothing Breeze
entries.effect: Restores health to targets in the area.

entries.name: Soothing Mist
entries.effect: Heals ally for minor wounds.

entries.name: Soul Beacon
entries.effect: Marks a target for undead minions, bolstering their damage and redirecting their focus.

entries.name: Spear Throw
entries.effect: A standard ranged throw that can impale and root enemies.

entries.name: Spear Volley
entries.effect: Throw all remaining spears in rapid succession, pinning and rooting enemies or dealing damage.

entries.name: Spectral Sight
entries.effect: Reveals hidden foes.

entries.name: Spellbane Arrow
entries.effect: Shots disrupt enemy spellcasting briefly.

entries.name: Spellweave
entries.effect: Chain minor effects together for a combined payoff.

entries.name: Spirit Brew
entries.effect: Heals an ally slightly.

entries.name: Spirit Link
entries.effect: Shares damage between nearby allies briefly, reducing the load on the initial sufferer.

entries.name: Spirit Mend
entries.effect: Restores health to a target.

entries.name: Spore Cloud
entries.effect: Creates a lasting damaging zone on the ground.

entries.name: Stampede
entries.effect: Tramples enemies along the path over two turns, dealing heavy damage or knocking enemies down.

entries.name: Static Field
entries.effect: Creates a storm zone that hinders enemy movement.

entries.name: Static Net
entries.effect: Snares a target with a crackling net.

entries.name: Stealth
entries.effect: Conceals or reduces chance to be targeted.

entries.name: Steam Slam
entries.effect: Vents steam in a burst, damaging nearby foes.

entries.name: Stellar Flare
entries.effect: Sears enemies with starfire, leaving burning damage.

entries.name: Stomp
entries.effect: Instantly damages all enemies in a radius.

entries.name: Storm Aura
entries.effect: Static drag slows the target’s steps.

entries.name: Storm Ward
entries.effect: Protects an ally from ranged attacks briefly.

entries.name: Stormborn Bulk
entries.effect: Lightning coursing through body, imparting storm damage each time struck by melee attacks.

entries.name: Stormcall
entries.effect: Summons a lightning storm over a target, striking up to three enemies each turn on successful rolls.

entries.name: Stormcrow Form
entries.effect: Transform into the shape of a stormcrow.

entries.name: Stormforged Discipline
entries.effect: Resists fear and charm effects.

entries.name: Storming Strike
entries.effect: Gryphon riders hurl their stormhammers, blasting the ground with clinging lightning that wounds any nearby enemies.

entries.name: Stout Resilience
entries.effect: Resists morale loss slightly.

entries.name: Strike
entries.effect: A standard strike that deals melee damage.

entries.name: Summon Construct
entries.effect: Conjures a major magical ally.

entries.name: Summon Familiar
entries.effect: Conjures a minor magical ally.

entries.name: Demonic Master
entries.effect: Summons a major demonic servant.

entries.name: Summon Major Void
entries.effect: Calls a major aberrant void spawn to the field.

entries.name: Demonic Pact
entries.effect: Summons a minor demon.

entries.name: Summon Minor Void
entries.effect: Calls a minor aberrant void spawn to the field.

entries.name: Sunbeam
entries.effect: A focused ray that sears shadow and doubt, and leaves burning nature or holy damage.

entries.name: Sun’s Blessing
entries.effect: Nearby allies resist shadow damage briefly.

entries.name: Suppress
entries.effect: Breaks up and scatters disorderly groups.

entries.name: Surefooted
entries.effect: Prevents being knocked down or off balance.

entries.name: Surprise Attack
entries.effect: Summons nearby allies into the fight from cover.

entries.name: Swamp Dash
entries.effect: Quickly move a short distance without teleporting.

entries.name: Tentacle Crush
entries.effect: Any victim still held by Tentacle Grasp is crushed in its grasp, dealing crushing damage and leaving them weakened upon release.

entries.name: Tentacle Grapple
entries.effect: Tentacles grasp the target and wrench it up into the air, requiring the victim to try to break free.

entries.name: Tentacle Hurl
entries.effect: Any victim still held by Tentacle Grapple is thrown hard, slaming into any obstacles in the way, dealing crushing damage and leaving them stunned.

entries.name: Thalassian Command
entries.effect: Nearby Blood Knights, Clerics, Farstriders, and Magisters act with greater discipline.

entries.name: Thick Hide
entries.effect: Grants a -1 damage reduction each turn.

entries.name: Thick-Skulled
entries.effect: Reflects damage back onto the attacker.

entries.name: Thunderclap
entries.effect: A colossal impact stuns the target briefly.

entries.name: Tidal Coil
entries.effect: Yanks a target toward the user.

entries.name: Tidal Shield
entries.effect: Protects an ally with flowing water.

entries.name: Tidal Surge
entries.effect: A surge of water heals wounded allies.

entries.name: Tiger’s Pounce
entries.effect: Leaps onto a foe, pinning them briefly.

entries.name: Time Blink
entries.effect: Instantly repositions and rewinds time one turn.

entries.name: Time Warp
entries.effect: Briefly accelerates allies’ actions.

entries.name: Totem Ward
entries.effect: Nearby allies resist magic briefly.

entries.name: Tree-Trunk Swing
entries.effect: A sweeping blow that shatters guard.

entries.name: Tribal Hex
entries.effect: Weakens enemies' resistance to fear effects.

entries.name: Tribal Rally
entries.effect: Nearby primative humanoids rally and rush on, increasing their haste.

entries.name: Tunnel Collapse
entries.effect: Instantly damages all enemies in a radius.

entries.name: Tusk Gore
entries.effect: Brutal gore attack that disrupts foe.

entries.name: Tusklash
entries.effect: Heavy tusk strike that staggers foe.

entries.name: Twin Glaives
entries.effect: Detonates fel force, damaging all enemies in a radius.

entries.name: Twisted Hide
entries.effect: Resistant to shadow damage.

entries.name: Undertow
entries.effect: Pulls enemies down with crushing water currents.

entries.name: Unnerving Howl
entries.effect: Lets loose an unnerving howl that strikes fear into adversaries.

entries.name: Unstable Engineering
entries.effect: Suffers catastrophic failure when critically damaged.

entries.name: Unstoppable Rage
entries.effect: Ignores effects that would slow them.

entries.name: Unwinding Touch
entries.effect: Fate-sands erase beneficial traits.

entries.name: Vampiric Touch
entries.effect: Leeches health every time target is damaged.

entries.name: Vault Enchantment
entries.effect: Able to quickly enchant or disenchant vault doors within arcane sanctums, either sealing or unsealing them for access.

entries.name: Veil Step
entries.effect: Passes through the Veil to evade danger.

entries.name: Veilshot Step
entries.effect: Blink between shadowed cover; gains advantage on the next shot.

entries.name: Veilwalker
entries.effect: Slides through shadows to elude blows.

entries.name: Venom Bite
entries.effect: Inflicts sickness that weakens and harms.

entries.name: Venom Kris
entries.effect: Poisons enemies with bladed strikes.

entries.name: Venom Spit
entries.effect: Inflicts sickness that weakens and slows enemies.

entries.name: Venom Sting
entries.effect: Inflicts sickness that weakens and harms.

entries.name: Venom Web
entries.effect: Immobilizes and poisons foe.

entries.name: Verdant Aegis
entries.effect: Dream-warded scales reduce incoming harm.

entries.name: Verdant Call
entries.effect: Summons a minor nature elemental to the field.

entries.name: Vinebind
entries.effect: Vines seize the target in place, preventing movement.

entries.name: Vinewhip
entries.effect: Whips with thorned vine, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Void Blade
entries.effect: Bypasses shields briefly.

entries.name: Void Bolt
entries.effect: Blasts enemies with void energy.

entries.name: Void Bolt
entries.effect: Strikes enemies with entropic magic.

entries.name: Void Channel
entries.effect: Stabilizes volatile shadow magics nearby.

entries.name: Void Curse
entries.effect: An eldritch malediction afflicts the target, weaking them progressively each turn until cured.

entries.name: Void Dagger
entries.effect: On hit, silences spellcasting briefly.

entries.name: Void Mend
entries.effect: Draws upon the entropic nature of the void to erase wounds over time.

entries.name: Void Prophecy
entries.effect: Spreads fear with visions of doom.

entries.name: Void Rift
entries.effect: Summons a portal that disrupts terrain briefly.

entries.name: Void Root
entries.effect: Grasping tendrils seize the target in place, preventing movement.

entries.name: Void Sense
entries.effect: Detects illusions and hidden foes.

entries.name: Void Slash
entries.effect: Blade wounds linger with void corruption.

entries.name: Void Stealth
entries.effect: Merges with shadow, becoming harder to target.

entries.name: Void Strike
entries.effect: Strikes the target with a warped bolt of shadow, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Void Trueshot
entries.effect: Arrows tear through veils and illusions.

entries.name: Void Ward
entries.effect: Absorbs attacks until overwhelmed, and then unleashes that damage in an explosion.

entries.name: Void Whisper
entries.effect: Mutters spells that confuse.

entries.name: Voidmancer's Ritual
entries.effect: Summons the most powerful aberrant void entities as elites, or bosses.

entries.name: Voidstep
entries.effect: Teleports through rifts.

entries.name: Voidstorm
entries.effect: Rips a tear through reality and beckons a storm of void bolts raining down upon an area.

entries.name: Volatile Fuel
entries.effect: Risk of catastrophic detonation on failure.

entries.name: Volatile Potion
entries.effect: Throws a random potion with unpredictable results.

entries.name: Volatile Potion Toss
entries.effect: Throws a volatile flask, dealing damage and spreading poison.

entries.name: Volley
entries.effect: Can hit multiple enemies with a rain of arrows.

entries.name: Voodoo Brew
entries.effect: Tosses a fetid draught that weakens resolve.

entries.name: Wail of the Dead
entries.effect: A keening shriek that rattles courage.

entries.name: War Banner
entries.effect: Raises morale of the tribe.

entries.name: War Chant
entries.effect: Nearby pygmies gain morale and strike harder.

entries.name: War Horn
entries.effect: A brazen call that steels allied hearts, emboldening allies to strike twice as hard on their next hit.

entries.name: Warble of the Tide
entries.effect: Allies fight harder when able to hear the crashing of waves nearby.

entries.name: Warchief’s Banner
entries.effect: Nearby troops rally and fight harder.

entries.name: Ward of the Sun
entries.effect: Sun-etched sigils dampen spell damage briefly.

entries.name: Ward Script
entries.effect: Enables sight of trespassers stepping through wards.

entries.name: Wardbreaker
entries.effect: Disrupts magical barriers.

entries.name: Warding Prayer
entries.effect: Allies are healed when damaged.

entries.name: Wardstone Core
entries.effect: Raises defenses or maximum health temporarily.

entries.name: Warlord’s Command
entries.effect: Nearby troops strike with renewed vigor.

entries.name: Warming Light
entries.effect: Restores health to targets in an area.

entries.name: Warped Hide
entries.effect: Grants a protective barrier or damage reduction.

entries.name: Water Bolt
entries.effect: Deals damage and knocks foes off balance.

entries.name: Water Healing
entries.effect: Heals nearby allies slightly.

entries.name: Water Veil
entries.effect: Harder to target briefly after striking.

entries.name: Wave Shield
entries.effect: Summons a wall of water to block harm briefly.

entries.name: Web of Domination
entries.effect: Assert control over lesser spawn.

entries.name: Web Shot
entries.effect: Entangles a target in sticky silk.

entries.name: Web Snare
entries.effect: Immobilizes the target in place.

entries.name: Webbed Root
entries.effect: Thick webbing pins the target, preventing movement.

entries.name: Webbed Shield
entries.effect: Layered silk hardens into a carapace, reducing harm.

entries.name: Webbed Strike
entries.effect: A flurry of rapid strikes to victims already webbed, dealing double damage upon hit.

entries.name: Whip Crack
entries.effect: Demoralizes slaves and enemies alike, including beasts.

entries.name: Whirl of Blades
entries.effect: Carves with paired blades, dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Whirling Strike
entries.effect: Swings wildly at surrounding enemies.

entries.name: Whirlwind Gust
entries.effect: Pushes enemies back with storm winds.

entries.name: Whirlwind Rage
entries.effect: Spins weapons to strike many foes.

entries.name: Whirr-and-Bite
entries.effect: A surprising nip from tiny gears.

entries.name: Whispered Command
entries.effect: Sows doubt among enemies.

entries.name: Whispered Insight
entries.effect: Occasionally perceives hidden things.

entries.name: Whispering Darkness
entries.effect: Whispers from the dark unnerve the target, forcing them to flee.

entries.name: Whispers of Blood
entries.effect: Dark sermon saps morale and focus.

entries.name: Whispers of the Void
entries.effect: Confuses nearby foes.

entries.name: Wicked Hex
entries.effect: Afflicts a foe with gnawing misfortune and a -1 disadvantage.

entries.name: Wicked Pact
entries.effect: Detonates a minion with fel force, damaging all enemies in a radius.

entries.name: Wild Conflagration
entries.effect: Erupts a tongue of flame at range, dealing damage.

entries.name: Wild Shape
entries.effect: Transform into the shape of a beast.

entries.name: Wild Swing
entries.effect: Hits multiple foes with reckless abandon.

entries.name: Wind Slash
entries.effect: Knocks enemy back briefly, staggering them.

entries.name: Wind Walk
entries.effect: Turns invisible until striking.

entries.name: Wind’s Wrath
entries.effect: Knocks back enemies with gale force.

entries.name: Wing Buffet
entries.effect: Pushes the target back and disrupts movement.

entries.name: Winged Strike
entries.effect: Dive attack staggers foe briefly.

entries.name: Winterborn Toughness
entries.effect: Takes reduced damage from cold.

entries.name: Wisdom of the Sea
entries.effect: Nearby allies resist fear effects.

entries.name: Witch’s Hex
entries.effect: Inflicts Weakened (-1) for 2 turns.

entries.name: Wolf Brother
entries.effect: Fighting beside a wolf companion grants +1 advantage.

entries.name: Wolf Charge
entries.effect: Charge at the enemy, gaining +1 damage upon successful hit and knocking enemies down.

entries.name: Worgen Form
entries.effect: Transformation empowers agility and reflexes, granting a +1 to offensive rolls.

entries.name: Worgen Fury
entries.effect: Dangerous claws and feral rage leaves raking wounds that bleed when melee attacks hit.

entries.name: Work Work
entries.effect: Carries supplies and materials.

entries.name: Wrench Swing
entries.effect: Improvised melee attack with tools.

entries.name: Wrench Toss
entries.effect: Improvised ranged attack with tools.

entries.name: Zeal Tempered
entries.effect: Pushes through fear and hesitation; steadies nearby squires.

entries.name: Zealotry
entries.effect: Immune to fear this round.

entries.name: Meteor Impact
entries.effect: A violent meteor impact that blasts all nearby enemies with immense damage and knocks them backwards.

entries.name: Flameforged Strike
entries.effect: Damages up to two adjacent targets in a melee arc.

entries.name: Hellfire
entries.effect: Summons a devastating rain of fire from the skies above.

entries.name: Sandstorm
entries.effect: Summons a blistering storm of sand that damages and blinds any enemies in the area.

entries.name: Shadow Volley
entries.effect: Unleashes a deadly volley of shadow bolts.

entries.name: Benison
entries.effect: Increases damage, critical chance, or potency.

entries.name: Enduring Depths
entries.effect: Takes reduced damage in aquatic environments.

entries.name: Guardian Ward
entries.effect: Broad shields and a fierce sense of duty compels the wielder to defend their allies against harm.

entries.name: Hardened Bark
entries.effect: Thick, well aged bark shields the servant of nature from incoming damage.

entries.name: Runic Scales
entries.effect: Runic scales ward off area-wide damage.

entries.name: Aquatic Assault
entries.effect: Charge at the enemy underwater, gaining +1 damage upon successful hit dealing direct damage.

entries.name: Mana Drain
entries.effect: Steals mana from foes.

entries.name: Icicle Spear
entries.effect: A launched ice spear that punctures through both heavy and light armor.

entries.name: Fireball
entries.effect: Launches a ball of fiery magic at the target from range.

entries.name: Thorn Shield
entries.effect: Damage dealt back when struck in melee.

entries.name: Draconic Crash
entries.effect: Descends rapidly from the sky and slams into the ground, throwing everyone nearby backwards and stunning them, leaving them vulnerable.

entries.name: Life Flame
entries.effect: Heals all allies and burns all undead or demons within the area.

entries.name: Chains of Desire
entries.effect: Chains enemies together and slows them, as well as mirroring all damage taken next turn to each individual attached.

entries.name: Arcanist's Ritual
entries.effect: Conjures the most powerful magical constructs as an ally.

entries.name: Call Drakes
entries.effect: A bellowing call summons full grown drakes from the skies, adding more threats to the field.

entries.name: Call Whelps
entries.effect: A bellowing call summons whelplings from their brooding dens or eggs, directing them to swarm targeted enemies.

entries.name: Chrono Correction
entries.effect: Warps time to correct prior mistakes, enabling the caster to reverse injuries or outcomes at will.

entries.name: Sands of Madness
entries.effect: Elemental fate-sands warp the target's mind, and the subsequent visions of both future and past possibilities drives the victim to temporary madness.

entries.name: Skin Walking
entries.effect: Strips out the soul of an individual, enabling the manipulator to inhabit the host.
